# The 4 Transformations (of Frieze patterns)

```{r,echo=F,fig.size=c(12,8)}
par(mar=c(0,1.5,3,1.5),mfrow=c(2,2))

cex = 2

x1 = c(2,2,7,7,4,4,6,6,4,4)-10
y1 = (c(2,8,8,7,7,6,6,5,5,2)-5)*3
plot(0,0,"n",xlim=c(-10,10),ylim=c(-10,10),axes=F,ann=F)
mtext("translation",3,cex=cex)
polygon(x1,y1,col = "black")
x2 = x1+10
polygon(x2,y1,col = "black")
polygon(c(-10,-10,10,10),c(-10,10,10,-10))
lines(c(0,0),c(-10,10))

plot(0,0,"n",xlim=c(-10,10),ylim=c(-10,10),axes=F,ann=F)
mtext("mirror reflection",3,cex=cex)
polygon(x1,y1,col = "black")
x2 = -x1
polygon(x2,y1,col = "black")
lines(c(0,0),c(-10,10))
polygon(c(-10,-10,10,10),c(-10,10,10,-10))

plot(0,0,"n",xlim=c(-10,10),ylim=c(-10,10),axes=F,ann=F)
mtext("rotation (180Â°)",3,cex=cex)
polygon(x1,y1,col = "black")
x2 = -x1
y2 = -y1
polygon(x2,y2,col = "black")
lines(c(0,0),c(-10,10))
polygon(c(-10,-10,10,10),c(-10,10,10,-10))
polygon(c(-1,0,1,0),c(0,0.5,0,-0.5),col="black")

plot(0,0,"n",xlim=c(-10,10),ylim=c(-10,10),axes=F,ann=F)
mtext("glide reflection",3,cex=cex)
polygon(x1,y1,col = "black")
x2 = x1+10
y2 = -y1
polygon(x2,y2,col = "black")
lines(c(0,0),c(-10,10))
polygon(c(-10,-10,10,10),c(-10,10,10,-10))
abline(h=0,lty=3)


```
